body.name: Betadine Antiseptic First Aid Spray, Povidone-iodine 5%, Infection Protection, Kills Germs In Minor Cuts Scrapes And Burns, No Sting Promise, No Alcohol or Hydrogen Peroxide, 3 FL OZ
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 19 mins
features: Trusted By Healthcare Professionals: The Betadine brand has been trusted and used in hospitals for over 50 years; Simply dab Betadine Antiseptic Solution over the minor wound after cleaning and let dry; Use as directed
Helps Prevent Infection: Betadine works on a broad range of germs and microbes; Helps stop infections before they start; the golden-brown color of povidone-iodine shows you where it has been applied
10% Povidone-Iodine: Betadine Antiseptic First Aid Solution is an aqueous solution of povidone-iodine 10% that kills germs promptly in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns
Prep like the Pros: Betadine Antiseptic First Aid Solution is infection protection you can trust in a convenient solution; Can be used on adults and children for minor wounds
Gentle, No-Sting Promise: Betadine does not contain alcohol or hydrogen peroxide which may not sting; Betadine Antiseptic Solution is formulated with gentleness in mind
body.description: Prep like the pros with infection protection you can trust. The Betadine brand has been trusted by healthcare professionals to help prevent infections for over 50 years. Povidone-iodine remains a go-to antiseptic used both in hospitals and homes for the treatment of minor cuts, scrapes, and burns as may occur from minor household accidents or bicycle falls. It remains a go-to antiseptic used both in hospitals and homes for the treatment of minor cuts, scrapes, and burns as may occur from minor household accidents or bicycle falls. Betadine Antiseptic Solution is convenient and is perfect for on-the go infection protection. Betadine works on a broad range of germs and microbes that can that can cause infections. Apply to minor cuts, scrapes, and burns to promptly kill germs and help stop infections before they start. Betadine Antiseptic Solution comes with a “No-Sting Promise” and does not contain alcohol or hydrogen peroxide. Betadine is formulated with gentleness in mind and can be used on the whole family. Use as directed.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Betadine Antiseptic Spray 3 Fl Oz Betadine Antiseptic Dry Powder Spray 2 Oz Betadine Antiseptic Solution 8 Fl Oz Betadine Antiseptic Sore Throat Gargle 8 Fl Oz Form Convenient, no-touch application sprayConvenient, no-touch application spray Dry Powder Spray with no mess, no touch, no drip First aid kit staple in a solution Medicated mint flavored gargle liquid Active Ingredient Povidone-iodine, 5% Povidone-iodine, 5% Povidone-iodine, 10% Povidone-iodine, 0.5% Key Benefit Our convenient antiseptic spray helps provide infection protection against a variety of germs that can cause infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns Targeted spray delivers infection protection against a variety of germs that can cause infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns right where you want it Our original solution delivers infection protection from germs that can cause infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and burns Helps treat and relieve sore throat symptoms and temporarily reduces germs normally found in the mouth* Use For Minor cuts, scrapes, or burns Minor cuts, scrapes, or burns Minor cuts, scrapes, or burns Temporary relief of occasional sore throat Gentle, No Sting Promise Gentle on minor wounds and surrounding skin, No Sting Promise Gentle on minor wounds and surrounding skin, No Sting Promise Gentle on minor wounds and surrounding skin, No Sting Promise Gentle on minor wounds and surrounding skin, No Sting Promise *based on laboratory data

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient spray form.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars gecko mouth rot
reviews.reviewText: my cousin gave me her gecko because she couldn’t take care of him anymore, and told me he wouldn’t eat. when i got him he had horrible stuck shed on his eyes and mouth. when i helped him remove his stuck shed, i realized he had pus coming out of his mouth and his mouth looked weird so i realized he had mouth rot. i used some of this on a q tip a couple times a week and now he’s looking so much better and is eating and drinking! works like a charm for reptile friends

reviews.reviewText: I had to use this product for 1 week on my foot after surgery. It was so easy to use and I love how compact the bottle is.
